Title: Pythagorean Theorem in WPF
Description:
This project shows off using the Pythagorean Theorem in a simple drawing WPF Application.  
Measuring the distance between 2 objects in WPF can easily be achieved using this approach.
HomeWiki: simple example of using Pythagorean Theorem in WPF. Using this to calculate the distance between 2 UIElements in WPF
